events.message: I recently received the wrong item from my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
Based on the customer's message mentioning refund request due to wrong item received, the case is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to our refunds specialist team to handle the refund request properly.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and would like a refund. Iâ€™m here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item received so we can verify the issue quickly?
Here is my order number 987654321 and attached is a clear photo showing the incorrect product I was sent instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days and you can keep the wrong item as our apology.
Thanks for the quick response and the offer. I appreciate being able to keep the item and getting a refund fast.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please expect the amount to appear in your account shortly.
Just following up to ensure you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As you confirmed everything is resolved, we are now closing this case. Thank you for contacting support.
